div.p: Intensional Definition All descendants of 442083009 |Anatomical or acquired body structure (body structure) excluding 442083009 |Anatomical or acquired body structure (body structure).

description.value: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 442083009 | Anatomical or acquired body structure (body structure), excluding 442083009 | Anatomical or acquired body structure (body structure)
